TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ciwcia, title = Ciwcia, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciwcia} }

S.FORM: Ciwcia Itiniay i Guanshan Cen no Taitung ko Ciwcia a niyaro', 159 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 443 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 130 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 313 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis14 , Tayal2 , Paiwan1 , Bunun9 , Truku1 , roma2 .
